trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry" /> class defines the smallest unit of a code access security permission set for <see cref="N:System.DirectoryServices" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry" /> define a menor unidade de uma permissão de segurança de acesso do código definida para <see cref="N:System.DirectoryServices" />.

trans-unit.source: The path of the Active Directory Domain Services node to which the permissions apply.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do nó do Active Directory Domain Services ao qual as permissões se aplicam.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess,System.String)" /> constructor initializes a new instance of the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess,System.String)" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess,System.String)" /> inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry.Path" /> property gets a path to an Active Directory Domain Services node to which the permissions apply.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry.Path" /> obtém ou define um caminho para um nó do Active Directory Domain Services ao qual as permissões se aplicam.

trans-unit.source: The path to an Active Directory Domain Services node.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para um nó de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry.PermissionAccess" /> property gets the access levels used in creating permissions.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry.PermissionAccess" /> obtém os níveis de acesso usados na criação de permissões.
